name: Active Projects
sql: SELECT * FROM projects WHERE status = 'In Progress' LIMIT 5
description: Show first 5 projects currently in progress

name: Product Inventory
sql: SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock > 0 ORDER BY stock DESC LIMIT 20
description: View top 20 products with available stock, sorted by quantity

name: Sales Analytics
sql: SELECT region, SUM(totalAmount) as total_sales, COUNT(*) as transaction_count FROM sales GROUP BY region ORDER BY total_sales DESC
description: Analyze sales performance by region with totals and transaction counts
